fields.description:
Oracle provided tactical support from the clock tower. Two-Face made decisions with his coin. Mr. Freeze sought a cure for his wife.

  1. Two-Face made decisions with his coin. Harley Quinn caused chaos in downtown Gotham. The Joker escaped from Arkham Asylum again. The Riddler left cryptic clues for Batman.
    1. The Batmobile raced through the streets. The Dark Knight watches over Gotham City. Alfred prepared the Batmobile in the Batcave. Batman used his detective skills to solve the case.
    2. Commissioner Gordon activated the Bat-Signal. Commissioner Gordon activated the Bat-Signal. Bane challenged Batman in a test of strength.
    3. Harley Quinn caused chaos in downtown Gotham. Robin trained with Batman in Wayne Manor. The Batmobile raced through the streets.
  2. The Batmobile raced through the streets. Mr. Freeze sought a cure for his wife. Poison Ivy controlled the plants in Robinson Park. Bane challenged Batman in a test of strength.

comments.text: Two-Face made decisions with his coin. Poison Ivy controlled the plants in Robinson Park. Penguin operated his criminal empire from the Iceberg Lounge. Oracle provided tactical support from the clock tower.
